purpose: Facilitates the creation and orchestration of AI agents using a TypeScript framework that supports function calling.
principle: Builds on TypeScript to enable AI function calling, leveraging compiler skills to enhance agent capabilities.
reusability: Highly composable with support for TypeScript, includes plugins and API integration for extending functionality.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited documentation and stability issues typical of early-stage projects.
name: agentica
description: TypeScript AI AI Function Calling Framework enhanced by compiler skills.
highlight: Integrates AI function calling with TypeScript, enhanced by compiler skills for advanced agent orchestration.
